data.name: Dragon's Prophet: Free Pack
data.detailed_description:
Exciting times lie ahead! In a world populated by mighty dragons, only the chosen ones are capable of turning these majestic creatures into their battle companions. Experience epic adventures with a whole lair full of dragons to call your own!

To make the first steps of your adventure very special, we’re giving you a helpful XP bonus in the form of two valuable items. You’ll also start out with a loyal little pet that will follow you wherever you go.

Pack Contents:


Pet:
  • Feral Squama

Items:
  • Intermediate Experience Potion (1 day)
  • Basic Experience Bauble

All items will be delivered directly to your account storage after purchase. In the upper right corner appears a glowing letter. Leftclick on the icon to collect the delivered items.

Now is the time to enter the world of Auratia and become the next Dragon’s Prophet. Follow your destiny!

data.short_description: The free starter pack offers the perfect introduction into an exciting world full of dragons and adventure. A helpful XP bonus and a little pet will make your first hours in the game all the more fun.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4G or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8600 GT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Vista or windows 7
  • Processor: i5 2400 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 560 TI or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
